GraphStorm
  • graphstorm
  • View page source

graphstorm

The graphstorm package contains a set of functions for environment setup. Users can directly use the following code to use these functions.

>>> import graphstorm as gs
>>> gs.initialize()
>>> gs.get_rank()

gsf.initialize(ip_config, backend)

Initialize distributed inference context

gsf.get_feat_size(g, node_feat_names)

Get the feature's size on each node type in the input graph.

utils.get_rank()

Get rank of a process

utils.get_world_size()

Get the world size.
